description: A list of video games banned in Argentina

games.name: 10.000 Bullets
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: 25 to Life
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: 50 Cent: Blood on the Sand
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: 50 Cent: Bulletproof
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Afro Samurai
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Aliens vs. Predator
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Area 51
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released.

games.name: Army of Two
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Army of Two: The 40th Day
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Army of Two: The Devil's Cartel
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Beat Down: Fists of Vengeance
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Bloodrayne
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released. The banned, uncensored version, with Nazi references removed, was available on Steam and GOG without classification until it was taken down on May 31, 2016.

games.name: Bloodrayne II
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released. The banned, uncensored version was available on Steam and GOG without classification until it was taken down on May 31, 2016.

games.name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact violence related to incentives and rewards via an unlockable Arcade mode.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact violence related to incentives and rewards via an unlockable Arcade mode.

games.name: Call of Duty: World at War
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Carmageddon
games.reason: Was originally released in both cut and uncut versions attaining 18+ and 16+ ratings respectively, before the uncut 18+ version was banned following the 2003 reforms. The banned uncensored version was available on Steam and GOG without classification, until it was taken down on May 31, 2016.

games.name: Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now
games.reason: Was originally released in both cut and uncut versions attaining 18+ and 16+ ratings respectively, before the uncut 18+ version was banned following the 2003 reforms. The banned uncensored version was available on Steam and GOG without classification, until it was taken down on May 31, 2016.

games.name: Carmageddon: Max Damage
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact violence related to incentives and rewards.

games.name: Clive Barker's Jericho
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was later lifted.

games.name: Cold Fear
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Cold Winter
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released.

games.name: Condemned: Criminal Origins
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Condemned 2: Bloodshot
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Conflict: Denied Ops
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released.

games.name: Crackdown
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was lifted in 2018.

games.name: Crackdown 2
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was lifted in 2018.

games.name: Criminal Girls 2: Party Favors
games.reason: Banned because of sexual activity involving a person who is, or appears to be, under 18 years of age.

games.name: Dark Messiah of Might and Magic
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released. The ban was later lifted.

games.name: Dead Island
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was lifted in 2019.[40]

games.name: Dead Island: Riptide
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead Rising
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. Was later banned in 2018 because of violence in a public mall setting.

games.name: Dead Rising 2
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead Rising 2: Off the Record
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead Rising 3
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead Rising: Chop Till You Drop
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead Space
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released.[41]

games.name: Dead to Rights
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead to Rights II
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Dead to Rights: Retribution
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. In 2019, its RC rating has been appealed and overturned.

games.name: Dying Light
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Far Cry
games.reason: Originally given an 18+ rating. Banned for high-impact violence using realistic ragdoll effects. Game was re-censored to remove the ragdoll effects and re-attain the 18+ rating.

games.name: Football Manager
games.reason: Originally banned for recognizing Bavaria as an independent country. The ban was later lifted with the 2019 edition.

games.name: Gal*Gun 2
games.reason: Originally banned because of sexual activity involving people who are, or appear to be, minors. The ban was later lifted.

games.name: Gears of War
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was lifted in 2016.

games.name: Gears of War 2
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was lifted in 2016.

games.name: The Godfather: Black Edition
games.reason: Banned because of game controls imitating brutality and exortion.

games.name: The Godfather 2
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released.

games.name: God of War
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. The ban was lifted on the basis that the characters are of Greek mythology and the gameplay put a large emphasis on puzzle-solving.

games.name: Golden Axe: Beast Rider
games.reason: Banned because of high-impact gory violence.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released. The ban was lifted in 2012.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released. The ban was lifted in 2012.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
games.reason: Originally given a 16+ rating. However, the game was later banned because of high-impact gory violence. The game was re-censored, re-attaining the 16+ rating. The ban was lifted in 2012.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories
games.reason: Originally banned because of high-impact gory violence. A censored version was released. The ban was lifted in 2012.
